article.title: Mercury Delivers Radio Frequency Jammers
article.text: Mercury Systems Inc., Chelmsford, Mass., has announced that its Mercury Defense Systems subsidiary has received $2 million in follow-on orders to deliver advanced digital radio frequency memory jammers to the U.S. Navy. The orders are part of a firm-fixed-price, indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity time and material contract award issued in 2010. The systems should be shipped by the end of the company’s fiscal 2016 third quarter.
